name: Shashank
headerTaglineThree: I build things for the web.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: I design attractive and user-friendly website layouts, carefully customizing colors, fonts, and imagery for a cohesive look. My goal is to ensure a positive and seamless user experience, making the site engaging and easy to navigate.

services.title: Branding
services.description: I design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Performance Optimization
services.description: I specialize in fine-tuning website speed for rapid loading, employing advanced strategies such as image compression, code minification, and leveraging cutting-edge content delivery techniques.

services.title: App Developemnt
services.description: I make high-performance mobile app development with advanced speed optimization: image compression, code minification, and sophisticated content delivery.

aboutpara:
Aspiring Web Developer and recent Computer Science graduate with a Bachelor of Technology and hands-on experience from an internship at TekStitcher, a startup. Skilled in designing, developing, and implementing front-end and back-end functionalities for web and mobile applications. 

Winner of the Udaan Hackathon 2023, demonstrating dedication to innovation and continuous learning. Eager to contribute expertise and thrive in a dynamic development environment.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  Your go-to creator for exceptional websites, apps, and digital services.
resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to Hundreds of people. Well-versed with React, JavaScript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Designed and implemented front-end and back-end functionalities, Collaborated with UI/UX designers and conducted design and implementation reviews for multiple projects , Implemented and integrated modern tech stacks and frameworks. optimized development efficiency and maintainability , Collaborated with cross-functional teams to present technology architecture and progress updates

education.universityName: Institute of Engineering and Science, IPS Academy
education.universityPara: Bachelor of Technology, Computer Science, CGPA:- 8.87
